channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Neighbours broken intercom ringing in night, 21st October
item.description:
There is a broken doorbell/intercom making a constant noise upstairs in a flat- 53 or 52 Southwold Road. This noise is disruptive late at night and is repetitive, buzzing below. Please can the owner be pushed to fix this issue and remove disturbance.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Southwold Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water pools, 21st October
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kilburn High Road, London

item.title: Whitfield Gardens, 21st October
item.description:
There are metal rails installed in the pavement as a decorative feature and they are dangerously slippery in the wet. I slipped and smacked my knee on them today, probably a good idea to remove before someone breaks something.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Whitfield Street, Fitzrovia, London

item.title: Overgrown plant across waterfall and debris, 21st October
item.description:
The waterfall is running very slow as plants have again grown across it and leaves and debris build up stopping the waterfall flowing as it should. This has happened before a few months back. The water level is beginning to rise in the middle pond. If this is not fixed the water will start to overflow across the public footpaths.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Hill, Goddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Man flytipping, 21st October
item.description:
Caught a man with a trolley flytipping. I told him not to and he said “everybody does it here”. I told him not to. He shrugged, continued until he’d finished and then walked off towards the New River Cafe

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clissold Crescent, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Toxic chemical usage - causing residential health issue, 21st October
item.description:
Neighbour at no 7 montpellier square, has workmen using toxic chemicals - they are in heavy duty breathing masks - no warning and the chemical useage is high causing induced asthma responses. We have video of workman and van...

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Montpelier Square, Knightsbridge, London
Report on FixMyStreet
